meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Doug Jungemann Leslie Basalla Chuck Champagne Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4381.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Doug Jungemann, a satellite operations technician from Rapid City, South Dakota
Leslie Basalla, a newspaper reporter from Cleveland, Ohio
Chuck Champagne, a vice president of finance from Cumberland, Rhode Island (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,201)

tr.td: NURSERY RHYMES
HICKORY, DICKORY OR DOC
THE MOUSE
WREN
"UP THE"
CLOCKED
